feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Dense Smoke Advisory issued July 10 at 3:21AM AKDT until July 11 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense smoke. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until Midnight AKDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.

entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued July 10 at 3:21AM AKDT until July 12 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNINGS FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 220, 221, 222, 223, AND 224... .DISCUSSION... A thermal trough stretching from McGrath to Fairbanks to Eagle will persist into Monday. This, along with a warm and unstable airmass and shortwaves aloft moving west across Eastern Interior

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:49PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Flooding Possible on the Tanana River Starting Monday... Glacial rivers draining the Alaska Range such as the Tanana, Chisana, and Nabesna Rivers are running near bankfull. This is due to hot temperatures causing significant high elevation snow melt in the Alaska Range. Significant rainfall expected over the southeast Interior over the
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country

entry.title: High Surf Advisory issued July 09 at 2:39PM SST by NWS
entry.summary: ...A High Surf Advisory is in effect... * SURF...Surfs of 10 to 12 feet will continue to impact south and east facing shores due to a large southerly swell and moderate to fresh tradewinds. * TIMING...through the new week * IMPACTS...strong rip currents and large surfs.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
